client.window.title: JavaFX Chat Room
client.login.hint: If you don't have an account, you can signup without id.
client.login.login_missing_fields: You must login with valid ID/Nickname and Password
client.login.signup_missing_fields: You must signup with Nickname and Password
client.login.signup_success: You just registered an account, now login with it!
client.login.no_connection: Unable to connect server, try again.
client.login.registered: This nickname was occupied, try another one or login with this user
client.chat.motd: Welcome to the public chat room, feel free to talk!
alert.friend.invalid_self: You cannot add yourself to friend list!
alert.friend.already_friend: This user is already your friend!
alert.friend.sent_request: Successfully sent request to this user!
